AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.bus: Used to transport undocumented aliens from Sabinas Hidalgo to Nuevo Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.taxi: Used to transport undocumented aliens from the Nuevo Laredo bus terminal to a point close to the bridge leading into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.van: Used to smuggle undocumented aliens across the border, with a hidden compartment discovered by a Customs officer
